mapper.insert: insert into course values(course_seq.nextval, #{categoryNum}, #{creNum}, #{courseTitle}, #{courseContent}, #{courseKind}, #{courseLevel}, 0, sysdate, null, #{ courseStartDate }, #{ courseEndDate}, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from course join online_course using(course_num) where cre_num = #{creNum} and course_approved = 'Y' and course_status='Y' order by course_num desc
select * from course join offline_course using(course_num) where cre_num = #{creNum} and course_approved = 'Y' and course_status='Y' order by course_num desc
select count(*) from course where cre_num = #{creNum} and course_status!='R' and course_approved!='N'

select * from course left join offline_course using(course_num) left join online_course using(course_num) join category using(category_num) where course_approved ='N' and cre_num = #{creNum} order by course_num
select coa_num, course_num, coa_oname, coa_rname, coa_level, coa_path from course_attachment join course using(course_num) where cre_num = #{creNum} and coa_level = 1
select * from course_attachment where course_num = #{courseNum} and coa_level = 1
select * from single_course_view where course_approved = 'N'
select * from course join online_course using(course_num) join category using (category_num) where course_num = #{courseNum}
select * from course join offline_course using(course_num) join category using (category_num) where course_num = #{courseNum}
select * from course_attachment where course_num = #{courseNum} and coa_Level = 1
select * from single_course_view where course_approved = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM single_course_view ORDER BY love_count DESC)

select * from single_course_view where course_title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
UNION
select * from single_course_view where mem_nickname like '%'||#{search}||'%'
UNION
select * from single_course_view where category_name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select * from single_course_view where category_name = #{categoryName} and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from user_course_view where course_kind = 'online' and mem_num = #{memNum} and take_status = 'Y'
select * from user_course_view where course_kind = 'offline' and mem_num = #{memNum} and take_status = 'Y'
select * from payment join course using(course_num) join online_course using(course_num) join category using (category_num) where course_num = #{courseNum}
select * from payment join course using(course_num) join online_course using(course_num) join category using (category_num) where course_num = #{courseNum}
select sum(take_price) from takecourse where pay_num in (select pay_num from payment where course_num in (select course_num from course where cre_num=#{creNum}))
select * from single_course_view where cre_num = #{creNum} and course_status in ('Y', 'E', 'N')
select * from single_course_view order by decode (course_approved,'N',1,'B',2)
select * from single_course_view where course_num in (select course_num from takecourse tc join payment p using(pay_num) where tc.mem_num = #{memNum} and pay_cancel != 'Y')
select tc.mem_num from takecourse tc join payment using(pay_num) where take_status ='Y' group by tc.mem_num
select * from single_course_view where category_name='공예' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='디자인' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='개발' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='디지털 드로잉' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='라이프 스타일' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='미술' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='사진, 영상' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='시그니처' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='요리, 음료' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='음악' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='커리어' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y'
mapper.delete: delete from love where mem_num=#{memNum} and course_num=#{courseNum}
mapper.select: select review_num, course_num, m.mem_nickname "mem_nickname",m.mem_name "mem_name" , m.mem_profile_name "mem_profile_name", review_content,review_score, review_enroll_date, review_modify_date, review_status from review r join member m on(r.mem_num=m.mem_num) where review_status='Y' and course_num=#{courseNum}
select * from single_course_view where course_num in (select course_num from power where power_status = 'n')
select * from user_delivery_view
select * from single_course_view where category_name='공예' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y' and course_kind='online'
select * from single_course_view where category_name='디자인' and course_approved='Y' and course_status='Y' and course_kind='online'

select count(*) from member
select count(*) from creator
select count(*) from course where course_kind ='online'
select count(*) from course where course_kind = 'offline'
select NVL(round(avg(review_score),2), 0) from review where course_num in (select course_num from course where cre_num=#{creNum})
select * from course left join power using (course_num) where cre_num = #{creNum} and course_status = 'Y' and power_num is null
